TopicTitle: Ever wander why Aperture Science doesn't deal with Kerbals?

Articles.Content: This is why GLADOS can't have nice things.

I got one of my friends (who happens to be Kerbal), Helenferlina, to play Portal. When I checked back on her she had hacked the game and managed to be noclipping through the Moon scene.

Kerbals, man.

This has been a message from the Kerbal Space Program: RealSolarSystem universe.
